changelog: v1.5.10: BugWatcher as CI service, rate limit test fix, _guard() wired to api_stats.
changes: NEW: .github/workflows/bugwatcher.yml — triggers on deploy workflow failure, runs BugWatcher --ci --wait on GitHub's servers, pushes auto-fixes, waits for green
FIX: server.py _guard() now called from api_stats() — rate limiter was defined but never hooked into any endpoint
FIX: test_kam.py rate limit test now pre-fills _rl bucket to RL_MAX, then verifies 1 more request returns 429 — no longer timing-dependent on 1-second sliding window
